metadata.Title: CVE-2022-35018 on Ubuntu 20.04 LTS (focal) - low.
metadata.Description:
Advancecomp v2.3 was discovered to contain a segmentation fault.

Update Instructions:

Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2022-35018` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
by updating your system to the following package versions:

advancecomp - 2.1-2.1ubuntu0.20.04.1
No subscription required

notes.Note: mdeslaur> included in commits listed in CVE-2022-35014

criterions.comment: advancecomp package in focal was vulnerable but has been fixed (note: '2.1-2.1ubuntu0.20.04.1').
